item.title: The early days of Linux
item.description: My name is Lars Wirzenius, and I was there when Linux started. Linux is now a global success, but its beginnings were rather more humble. These are my memories of the earliest days of Linux, its creation, and the start of its path to where it is today.
item.author: (April 12, 2023 This article was contributed by Lars Wirzenius)
